Class AbstractActions<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cettia.asity.action.AbstractActions<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actions<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcurrentActions, SimpleActions

    public abstract class AbstractActions<T>
extends Object
implements Actions<T>
    Base implementation of Actions.

    Donghwan Kim
